name: Forgotten_
description:
Walk through and experience the environment of H.P. Lovecraft's short story Ex Oblivione.

Developed by Anna-Lien Juelsbak, Erik Nagy, Matyas Csepregi and Mikkel Eifoss of Group 7 in Aalborg University Medialogy 6th semester as Bachelor Project.

When finished with the experience, please fill out the following form:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfoOwTi8_igT0khQzzA7eCu5qvY9g4VN8knjiUU...
